career.name: University of Washgington
career.title: Computer Science Grader
description: Evaluating Java projects emphasizing correctness and object-oriented design principles.
Providing clear, constructive feedback to enhance student growth and code quality in an Introduction to Java course.

career.name: University of Washgington
career.title: Software Engineer Researcher
description: Performed a Systematic Mapping Study on autonomous drone security as the first author, published at an A-ranked software engineering conference.
Identified spoofing and network attacks as the primary threats, with machine learning emerging as the leading detection technique.
